text: Davide Castelli (born 30 August 1999) is an Italian footballer who plays as a forward for Pro Patria on loan from Genoa. In 2019, Castelli made the longlist for the Golden Boy award. ==Club career== On 5 October 2020 he joined Serie C club Pro Patria on loan from Genoa, whom he had just joined. ==Club statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |AlbinoLeffe |2016–17 |Lega Pro |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Villarreal C |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Tercera División |23||5||colspan="2"|–||0||0||23||5 |- |2019–20 |15||1||colspan="2"|–||0||0||15||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !38!!6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!38!!6 |- |Genoa |2020–21 |Serie A |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |Pro Patria (loan) |2020–21 |Serie C |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !39!!6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!39!!6 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1999 births Category:People from Clusone Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Italian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:U.C.
